reviewText:
I was sent a version that can only be played in some other country .I tried it on 3 different dvd players as well as my computer
and I get the same message that its the wrong region . I looked it up on the internet and sure enough my version is for europeon
dvd players? honest mistake ? I say hell no ...

BSG is such a good series - I still make references to it at work and with my family.
You like Star Trek? and all it's spawning's...
You'll like this.
Not to be confused with the first generation of Battlestar Galactica.
(No offense to Loren Green et al)
